name: The Official Radiohead at Glastonbury 2017 Video Game
name_original: The Official Radiohead at Glastonbury 2017 Video Game
description:
Finally, a text adventure that lets you relive that magical time in June 2017 when Radiohead played the main stage at Glastonbury. Remember how you got right up to the front row? It was something of a struggle but you made it!

Written by Tom McNally and Ben Edwards
